react

Class UnitSignal

  • java.lang.Object
    • react.Reactor<Slot<T>>
      • react.AbstractSignal<Void>
        • react.UnitSignal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignalView<Void>

    public class UnitSignal
extends AbstractSignal<Void>
    A signal that emits an event with no associated data. It can be used with UnitSlot like so: 
    UnitSignal signal = new UnitSignal();
 signal.connect(new UnitSlot() {
   public void onEmit () {
     // ...
   }
 });

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class react.Reactor

        Reactor.RListener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnitSignal() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void emit()
      Causes this signal to emit an event to its connected slots.
      UnitSlot slot()
      Returns a slot which can be used to wire this signal to the emissons of a Signal or another value.

      • Methods inherited from class react.Reactor
